document.full_text: bahrain will lift a state of emergency next week that was imposed when the government suppressed a democracy protest movement in march with the help of saudi and other gulf arab forces.
document.title: bahrain hopes for normalcy with martial law lifted
lines_and_colors: bahrain will lift a state of emergency next week that was imposed when the government suppressed a democracy protest movement in march with the help of saudi and other gulf arab forces.
